title: Download PESU notes
content: Can we download the notes in pesu academy any way? Or we have to study from the website only?

comments.body: right click on it and save it as pdf

Or better : use   
[https://better-pes.vercel.app/content](https://better-pes.vercel.app/content)

[https://better-pes-v1.vercel.app/content](https://better-pes-v1.vercel.app/content)

has all the pdfs
Just use PES media, everything will be there anyway
oh there are 2 better pes websites?
